articles.title: The Best AI Stock to Buy Right Now, According to a Wall Street Analyst (Hint: Not Nvidia or Palantir)
articles.content: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives believes Tesla is the most undervalued AI stock, citing significant potential in autonomous driving and robotics, despite recent market share losses and financial challenges.

articles.title: Tesla Earnings Loom: Bulls Eye $600, Bears Warn of $300
articles.content: Tesla stock has surged over 100% in 2025, reaching $440, with bulls targeting $600 and bears warning of potential drop to $300. The upcoming Q3 earnings report will be crucial in determining the stock's trajectory, with key focus on AI initiatives, autonomous driving, and robotics.
articles.author: Sam Quirke

articles.title: This Chinese Automaker Is Running Circles Around Tesla In 2025: Xpeng Stock Soars As EV Demand Heats Up In China
articles.content: Xpeng Inc. has significantly outperformed Tesla in the electric vehicle market, with 107% stock surge, strong vehicle deliveries, and aggressive European expansion, while Tesla faces competitive pressures and declining sales.
articles.author: Vishaal Sanjay

articles.title: The Best AI Stock to Buy Right Now, According to a Wall Street Analyst (Hint: Not Nvidia or Palantir)
articles.content: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives believes Tesla is the most undervalued AI stock, citing significant potential in autonomous driving and robotics, despite recent market share losses and financial challenges.
articles.author: Trevor Jennewine

articles.title: Passive Portfolios Are Now More Fragile Than Ever
articles.content: The article discusses how passive index investing has become increasingly risky, with portfolios heavily concentrated in tech stocks and underexposed to defensive sectors, potentially creating vulnerability during market downturns.
articles.author: Callum Thomas

articles.title: 2 Warren Buffett Quotes That Make Me Excited to Buy Rivian Stock
articles.content: Despite recent market challenges, Rivian shows potential for future growth with planned affordable EV models in 2026, presenting an attractive entry point for contrarian investors.
articles.author: Ryan Vanzo

articles.title: America’s AI Boom Faces a Supply Crisis — Jim Rickards Says the Solution Lies Beneath Our Feet
articles.content: Former CIA advisor warns that China's mineral export restrictions could threaten America's technological future, particularly in AI and chip manufacturing. A recent Supreme Court decision might help unlock vast domestic mineral resources worth potentially $150 trillion.
articles.author: Jim Rickards

articles.title: Dow Jones Faces Pressure as Shutdown Risk and Jobs Data Shape Market Narrative
articles.content: US stocks opened lower on Tuesday amid potential government shutdown risks and anticipation of key jobs data. The market is cautious about economic indicators and potential Federal Reserve rate decisions, with attention focused on JOLTS job openings data and potential impacts of a government shutdown.
articles.author: Fiona Cincotta
